commit message: Initial blank Android project template
Basic functionality works. Nothing fancy, but that's okay.
Icons and such in preparation of market release
Added support for Leadbolt, appenda, iac ads
version code++
Added 5 new ad sources, AsyncTask'd detection, added report activity
Updated known ad frameworks, added suspicious app reporting, licensed.
Bumped version code to 2.0
Version 2.1: fixed leadbolt detection, made list items more descriptive
Removed Urban Airship and Xtify from ad provider list
Version bump to 2.2
Version 2.3: Updated Moolah Media package definitions

2.4: Modified TapIt detection to be specific to their legacy
notification engine, not their whole SDK
2.5: Added AirPush 5.0 detection
2.5: Corrected AndroidManifest.xml, added move to sd support

3.0: Added support library, fragments, rotation handling, cancel
Also removed 'scan on startup' behavior, since some devices were
scanning on going back from ReportActivity because of it
Added copyright notice to tops of new 3.0 files
3.1: Fixed bug that could cause spurious task cancellations

Added missing eclipse-required build files

Dear anyone who ever tried to build this project from the github repo
before this commit: I'm sorry
Fixed bad .gitignore formatting
Fixed eclipse .project's project name entry
Updated readme formatting, copyright
Added .gitattributes and fixed line endings

Added 4 new ad providers

Special thanks to Asher Delug, CEO of Airpush, for providing their
names. I don't know why it never occurred to me before that every ad
company would be *thrilled* to have me be picking up all of their
competitors.
Added dialog informing 4.1+ users of obsolesence
3.2 version bump
